attributes.title: this app is terrible!
attributes.review: this app gave my phone a ton of unwanted pictures!!! it also tracked where i’m at and someone hacked into my phone because of it!!!! 😡😡😡 PLEASE. do NOT. download this horrendous app!! it is so terrible and i can’t believe that they would let this happen to a person who took the time of day to DOWNLOAD AND USE IT!!! this app was definitely the worst app i've had yet! it is disgusting and every time i opened the app it made this horrible whistling noise and my dog went crazy!! i thought my phone was going to explode!!! this app is fake news and i can’t believe that i have to write this review down!! ONE STAR!!!!!!!! 🤬🤬🤬

attributes.title: Horrible 😭

attributes.title: Piece of doo doo
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app I didn’t know what to expect. The first thing I saw when I opened it was a naked Cheeto orange. 🍑I went blind for a couple 🔑of minutes when I saw this horrific image. Anyways I brushed the previous 🍊moment off and decided to go down for a cup of coffee. When I went down everything was orange. Then the naked 💆‍♂️Cheeto man appeared. It was SCARY. He then started chanting in some strange language and then PARTS 🌝of his body began to explode (you know what I mean by parts). I am now 🦩scared for life. Do not download app. Not recommended 🧤for anyone especially 📒young children. There are no games on the app too so not worth it. STUPID APP

attributes.title: Do not download this app😭😭
attributes.review: I went to open the app and I saw this orange running around trying to do a workout and it had a bunch of very provocative noises in the background. Eventually it stopped and then it started showing me graphic images of people vomiting and having really bad diarrhea while it was blasting 400 songs all at once. I went to close the app and it completely shut down my phone. Immediately after I had to get a new phone and a new identity because apparently the app had my personal information and was planning to use it in a war. 😭😭 I do not recommend this app at allll😞😞

attributes.title: Awful✋🏼😾
attributes.review: I downloaded this app so I could see what my favorite bunker boy😼❤️ was up too but right when I opened the app😱 a message popped up saying that the FBI has my location and were coming for me.😿... all because I downloaded the app🙀!!! They didn’t show up until 666😈 minutes later but they threw cheese on me .. yes SLICES OF CHEESE ON ME🧀  and told me that only orange people are allowed to download the app😡 they kept calling me a libtard midget😖 I was angry ! 👄 they came to MY house throwing cheese at me!🧀😾 and called me names.😿 I would rate this app a 0 star if I could!😾🤟🏼 this app tracks your location and throws cheese at you if you are not orange!!!!!!!! 👁😽

attributes.title: Worst App You Can get
attributes.review: W when I open this app lots of music was playing for me and it was terrible music and it took forever to load and then it glitch in my phone completely shut down then it was glitching and everything was acting up I couldn’t open up any apps and it kept opening up by itself and was glitching telling me to do this and do that and I don’t really like this app I don’t think this app is the best app you can get because it’s really bad it’s glitching out a lot and this is a realtor but I do not get this app at all whatsoever one star review this is terrible who decided to make this app

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD‼️
attributes.review: This is what happened After downloading the app. a big orange guy holding the American flag appeared outside my house with an army of Karen’s saying things like “ trump 2020!” I was so scared but i knew I had to do something to get rid of them.  I realized to get rid of them I had to get my phone and destroy it/delete the app. The Karen’s tried to capture me but I rushed to grab my phone and deleted the app. after deleting the app a black butterfly came from my phone next thing I knew Ladybug and Catnoir were in front of me. And the rest is history, I didn’t see the orange guy after. So do not download this app or bad things will happen!

attributes.title: IT TOOK OVER MY HOUSE
attributes.review: this app is the worst when i tried downloading it, it took A WHOLE DAY to download and it takes up SOO much storage i had to remove almost all of my apps just for this one😠. After it finished downloading it just started to have a mind of its own and started taking over my phone! It started to just order random things of my phone and IT STARTED ORDERING ROACHES TO MY HOUSE. So not only did it take over my phone but my house im currently staying over at a friends house because i have a roach infestation in my house. In conclusion this is such a horrible app i don’t recommend downloading it, it’s a waste of time.

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: This app is so bad that the second I opened it a bunch of zombified grandpas and grandmas started to chant “TRUMP 2020!” And close in on me. Thankfully Joe Biden and his ninjas help me take down those evil doers. All of the sudden the 🍑 himself came in an ordered joe Biden to vote for him. Biden would not comply and Trump brutally murdered him. However, Biden came back as a ghost and haunted Donald Trump until he couldn’t tolerate it anymore. He went insane and started brutally murdering everyone that wasn’t loyal to him. Under the mist of all of this trumps family and millions of other anti-Trump supporters escaped the villainous peach and went into exile on the far away land of Pluto. I don’t recommend it.
